title: 2br/2ba ►REMODELED Owner's 3-story home ►2-car garage!
posting_body: TO VIEW THIS HOME:
Please reply by email to this posting
KEY DETAILS:
•Bedrooms: 2 Bedrooms
•Bathrooms: 2 Bathrooms
•Property Type: House
•Parking: 2-car side-by-side garage
•Lease Duration: Long-term or short-term - 1 Year Preferred
•Pets Policy: Pets Welcome
•Laundry: Washer and Dryer in unit
Remodeled owner's home, on three levels, with two-car side-by-side garage parking

The light-filled, meticulously renovated home boasts hardwood floors throughout and is complemented by a large living room with Bay windows, an elegant wood-burning fireplace, and a formal dining room.
The remodeled chef's kitchen offers granite countertops and all stainless appliances.
This two-bedroom, two-bathroom home delivers an upper-floor master suite with stunning ocean views.
Convenient indoor washer and dryer and two-car garage parking complete this home.

Beautiful sights and attractive amenities are only within a few blocks - Golden Gate Park, jogging trails, Ocean Beach, shops, supermarkets, trendy cafes, and restaurants off Geary Blvd and Clement Streets.
Easy transportation via Express bus to the financial district in approximately twenty minutes, or a ten-minute drive to 280 highway for a quick commute to the valley.
USF is ten minutes away, and SFSU is fifteen minutes from your new home.
Lease Terms:
Clean credit.
First-month rent and a security deposit of one month's rent.
The lease is for one year, but the term is fully negotiable.
The move-in date is anytime in August or September 1st.
Thank you for reading this posting.
If you would like to schedule a private viewing, please reply by email to this posting.
All home showings are by confirmed appointment.
